tool_description: Creates temperature-based alerts when readings exceed safe thresholds or compliance violations occur.

trigger_condition.description: Alert condition: temperature_high, temperature_low, compliance_violation, sensor_failure

priority_level.description: Alert priority: low, medium, high, critical

error_messages: Invalid trigger_condition: Must be one of [temperature_high, temperature_low, compliance_violation, sensor_failure].
Invalid location_id: Location identifier must be non-empty alphanumeric string.
Temperature values invalid: Current and threshold temperatures must be valid numbers within -20°F to 200°F range.
Invalid priority_level: Must be one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Threshold logic error: For temperature_high alerts, current must exceed threshold; for temperature_low alerts, current must be below threshold.
usage: Specify trigger_condition, location_id, current_temperature, and threshold_temperature. Set priority_level based on food safety risk. Tool generates timestamped alert with unique ID.

alert_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when alert was generated
